lore: Runeterra has no shortage of valiant champions, but few are as tenacious as Poppy. Bearing the legendary hammer of Orlon, a weapon twice her size, this determined yordle has spent untold years searching in secret for the fabled “Hero of Demacia,” said to be its rightful wielder. Until then, she dutifully charges into battle, pushing back the kingdom's enemies with every whirling strike.
title: Keeper of the Hammer

allytips: Iron Ambassador tends to land near walls, try to take advantage of this with Heroic Charge.
Keeper's Verdict can be released immediately to send the enemy straight up, take advantage of this in duels.

passive.name: Iron Ambassador
passive.description:
Poppy throws her buckler, gaining range and bonus magic damage.

The buckler lands at a nearby location and Poppy can pick it up to gain a shield. Enemies can step on the buckler to destroy it.
passive.sanitizedDescription: Poppy throws her buckler, gaining range and bonus magic damage. The buckler lands at a nearby location and Poppy can pick it up to gain a shield. Enemies can step on the buckler to destroy it.

enemytips: Poppy can stop nearby enemies from dashing with Steadfast Presence.
When Poppy starts to spin her hammer, she is charging Keeper's Verdict.
You can step on Poppy's shield to deny it from her.
name: Poppy

spells.name: Hammer Shock

spells.description: Poppy dashes to the target and pushes it back. If the target is pushed into a wall, it is stunned.

spells.name: Keeper's Verdict
spells.description: Poppy channels a hammer strike that knocks enemies very far away.
spells.sanitizedDescription: Poppy channels a hammer strike that knocks enemies very far away.
spells.tooltip:
First Cast: Poppy channels for up to {{ e3 }} seconds, slowing herself by {{ e7 }}%.

Second Cast: Poppy smashes the ground, emanating a shockwave that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage to enemies around the first champion hit and knocking them a large distance toward their Summoning Platform. The shockwave length and knockback distance increases with channel duration.

Enemies hit with an uncharged Keeper's Verdict will take half the damage and be knocked straight into the air for half the duration. Enemies are untargetable while they are being knocked away.
